final_mermaid_code:
%%{init: {'theme': 'base', 'themeVariables': { 'fontFamily': 'Arial', 'fontSize': '14px'}}}%%
graph TB
    subgraph Client
        direction TB
        A([Quote needed]) --> B[Request insurance quote]
        B -.->|Request for quote| H
        B --> C[Evaluate insurance quote]
        C --> D{XORGateway}
        D -->|Accepted| E[Accept quote]
        D -->|Rejected| F[Reject quote]
        F --> G([Quote rejected])
    end

    subgraph Insurer
        direction TB
        H([Request for quote received]) --> I[Prepare insurance quote]
        I --> J{XORGateway}
        J --> K([Quote acceptance received])
        J --> L([Quote rejection received])
        K --> M[Prepare insurance contract]
        L --> N([Quote rejected])
    end

    %% Flows between Client and Insurer
    E -.->|Acceptance notification| K
    F -.->|Rejection notification| L

    %% Styling
    style A fill:#ffffff,stroke:#000000,stroke-width:1px
    style B fill:#ffffcc,stroke:#000000,stroke-width:1px
    style C fill:#ffffcc,stroke:#000000,stroke-width:1px
    style D fill:#ffffff,stroke:#000000,stroke-width:1px
    style E fill:#ffffcc,stroke:#000000,stroke-width:1px
    style F fill:#ffffcc,stroke:#000000,stroke-width:1px
    style G fill:#ffffff,stroke:#000000,stroke-width:1px
    style H fill:#ffffff,stroke:#000000,stroke-width:1px
    style I fill:#ffffcc,stroke:#000000,stroke-width:1px
    style J fill:#ffffff,stroke:#000000,stroke-width:1px
    style K fill:#ffffff,stroke:#000000,stroke-width:1px
    style L fill:#ffffff,stroke:#000000,stroke-width:1px
    style M fill:#ffffcc,stroke:#000000,stroke-width:1px
    style N fill:#ffffff,stroke:#000000,stroke-width:1px
